availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ezekiel Wilty (Edmonson County, Kentucky, resident and soldier.)

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, resident and soldier. Private in Third Kentucy Veteran Volunteer Cavalry from February 9, 1862 to March 1862. Deserted in March 1862 in Elizabethtown, Kentucky. Resident of Edmonson County, Kentucky in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 446.
KYR-0001-004-0996
